meanings.definition: The quality of being spooky or eerie.
meanings.sent1: The spookiness of the old haunted house gave me chills.
meanings.sent2: The spookiness of the forest at night made me feel uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The spookiness of the Halloween decorations made me jump!
meanings.sent4: The spookiness of the abandoned graveyard was like a ghostly whisper.
meanings.sent5: The spookiness of the fog enveloped everything in a mysterious haze.

meanings.definition: A feeling of fear or unease.
meanings.sent1: I couldn't shake off the spookiness I felt after watching the horror movie.
meanings.sent2: The spookiness in the air made me want to leave the dark alley quickly.
meanings.sent3: The spookiness of the strange noise turned out to be just a cat playing.
meanings.sent4: The spookiness of the unknown sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The spookiness of the shadowy figure made my heart race with fear.
